import React, {useState}from "react"; import { Col, Container, Button, Form, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import "./Login.css"; function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); return (
Email address setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} required/> We'll never share your email with anyone else. Password setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password} required/>

Dont have an account? Signup

); } export default Login;
